thread.title: Osorio to coach Mexico
thread.title_full: Osorio to coach Mexico | Sports | Saudi Gazette

author: saudigazette.com.sa
title: Osorio to coach Mexico
text:
MEXICO CITY — Colombian Juan Carlos Osorio is taking over as Mexico coach after resigning from Sao Paulo, the Brazilian club said in a statement Tuesday.
Osorio is set to replace Brazilian Ricardo “Tuca” Ferretti, who was named Mexico’s interim boss after Miguel Herrera. Ferretti is in California where Mexico faces the United States Saturday in a playoff to decide who represents the CONCACAF region in the 2017 Confederations Cup in Russia. — Reuters
